justification: Correctly targets B’s dual-threat QB preference and lets B unload an injured WR, but ignores B’s fondness for deep-threat WRs and the risk of weakening B’s RB corps by losing Harris. A’s return (floor RB) conflicts with A’s ceiling-chasing style. Rationale is terse and doesn’t reference B’s QB scarcity, injury avoidance, or strength-of-schedule details. Trade is feasible but only moderately aligned with both sides’ incentives.
